mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TB_TAXICAR
AND PlateNum LIKE '%'+#{PlateNum}+'%'
AND OpretaCertNum LIKE '%'+#{OpretaCertNum}+'%'
AND OwnerName LIKE '%'+#{OwnerName}+'%'
AND Area LIKE '%'+#{Area}+'%'
AND CorpName LIKE '%'+#{company}+'%'
